objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#0D1D3A'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#1A2845'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#0D1D3A'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#0F1F3C'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#2C3B57'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M0 140 L1080 140' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 280 L1080 280' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 420 L1080 420' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 560 L1080 560' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 700 L1080 700' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 840 L1080 840' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 980 L1080 980' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M140 0 L140 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M280 0 L280 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M420 0 L420 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M560 0 L560 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M700 0 L700 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M840 0 L840 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M980 0 L980 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='400' r='40' fill='#243962' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='980' cy='140' r='50' fill='#334973' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#506080' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#506080' stroke-width='1'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#gradient)'/><defs><linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#14213D' stop-opacity='0.2'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000' stop-opacity='0.5'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text:
• Tailored Fit Design
• Premium Wool Blend
• All-Season Comfort
• Business & Formal Ready

product_details.name: Premium Navy Business Blazer - Modern Professional Collection
product_details.description:
• Tailored fit navy blue blazer perfect for modern professionals
• High-quality wool blend fabric with superior comfort and durability
• Classic notch lapel design with sophisticated silhouette
• Sleek single-breasted style with two-button closure
• Breathable fabric suitable for all-season wear
• Deep navy color perfect for versatile styling options
• Interior pockets for convenient storage
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Easy-care fabric that maintains shape throughout the day
• Perfect for business meetings, formal events, or smart casual occasions

banner_details:
This banner features a premium fashion advertisement layout, combining sharp typography with a modern, sophisticated aesthetic. It prominently displays a stylish product image on the right, with the left section structured into multiple text elements to convey branding, collection title, a promotional tagline (`tagline`), feature list (`description`), and compelling pricing (`price`). The headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) commands attention with bold, uppercase text. The subheading (`subheading`) adds subtle elegance in a tech-styled font. A rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with accompanying text (`cta`) invites the user to shop. The minimal grid overlay and circular highlights enrich the deep-toned gradient background without distraction.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy (#0D1D3A)
- Slate Blue (#506080)
- Ice White (#FFFFFF)
- Sky Gray (#A3B1D9)
- Gold Accent (#FFBB00)
- Charcoal Blue (#243962)
- Steel Gray (#334973)
product_color: The product image showcases a sharp, sophisticated look with a dominant color palette that includes rich navy blue, crisp white, jet black, and subtle skin tones. The suit's navy blue (#1C2D6C) serves as the focal color—deep and elegant, it exudes professionalism. The shirt is a bright, clean white (#FFFFFF), providing a stark contrast that emphasizes the sleek tailoring of the suit. The black leather belt (#1C1C1C) adds definition and polish. Skin tones like a warm beige (#F1D1BB) soften the palette. Together, these colors blend seamlessly, highlighting each element while maintaining balance—ideal for banners with a modern, professional aesthetic.
